entities.name: shell cottage
entities.description: The cottage where Bill and Fleur live, described as a lonely and beautiful place with walls embedded with shells and white-washed.

entities.name: bill and fleur's cottage garden
entities.description: The garden of the cottage where Harry spends time, described as having a constant ebb and flow of the sea.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character who is struggling with doubts about his decision not to race Voldemort for the wand.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Harry's friend who voices his doubts and questions Harry's decision.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A character mentioned as possibly wanting Harry and Ron to work out the symbol in time to get the wand.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist who is after the Elder Wand.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: A powerful wand that Voldemort is trying to obtain.

entities.name: hallows
entities.description: A set of three objects that are central to the story.

relationships.description: Harry spends time in the cottage and its garden, described as a lonely and beautiful place.
Ron is Harry's friend who voices his doubts about Harry's decision.
Dumbledore may have wanted Harry and Ron to work out the symbol in time to get the wand.
Voldemort is trying to obtain the Elder Wand.
